title: 778: BITCOIN WILL HIT $80K - HERE'S WHEN!! METAVERSE, NFTs AND DEFI GAMING CRYPTO EXCLUSIVE INTERVIEW!!
description:
In this interview with YAY Games CEO Nick Epifanov, we discuss the hottest trends in crypto right now including the Metaverse, NFT marketplaces, play-2-earn games and the future of DEFI crypto gaming from an insiders perspective.

Nick also shares his analysis on the current cryptocurrency market as well as his Bitcoin and Ethereum price predictions for this cycle peak.

For complete show notes and for the full premium experience with video, visit YT channel at: http://CryptoNewsAlerts.net
